title: What would make me happy in reguards to Fiora... as the World's best Fiora
body:
1.  Give Fiora her old ult back.     I can't tell you what a dud this one is in comparison to me.
That took the fun out of her.

2.  Give her double lunge back.  I can't do level 1 pentakills without it.

Then the rest just keep the same...  her passive etc. 

That would make me happy Riot.

replies.body:
You can't be the best, you're Bronze with a 40% WL Under 2 KDA on her and you're is iffy.

Her new ult gives counterplay
Her new Lunge is way better.

I miss old Fiora too but this one is simply more healthy and least feast or famine.

Well consider that the champ it's self is nerfed and ruined.  My win rate would be down.  Consider also that all 4 of my teamates are always bad. You can no longer carry games with 4 bad teamates and a nerfed champ. Consider that good players don't rise up the ladder because teaching noobs gets you banned because they are know it all Fiora haters.   Adding a timer on her double lunge killed her double lunge.  I think that is irrefutable and makes you sound ignorant. Her double lunge was everything. No more double lunge. No more level 1 pentkills.  Not for me anyway.  Do any of you get level 1 pentakills with the new Fiora?  I doubt it. You killed her RIot.  You killed her...   Shame on you.

Lol as someone who played both new and old Fiora, new fiora is far from ruined. She's still an animal, you just have to be good with her now.

Try building her better.
I highly doubt you are the best fiora

> I highly doubt you are the best fiora

well since you're the best id be happy to upvote so riot sees this 

good luck +1
Thanks wow...  One nice person!  A diamond in the ruff.
so much sarcasm that i can understand why you thought he was being serious

Trust me: STOP BUILDING CRIT. 
It's so counter productive with her e.

If you insist in that build and want old fiora ult, learn master yi.
